means: 使恢复元气，使具有新的活力( revitalize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The revitalized team came from the cellar to win the pennant.
sentence.Network_cn: 该队重整旗鼓,从最后一名一跃而赢得冠军奖旗.

sentence.Network_en: Her appointment as leader revitalized the party.
sentence.Network_cn: 她担任领袖后,该党获得了转机.

sentence.Network_en: In the last three decades optics has been revitalized by several important discoveries.
sentence.Network_cn: 近三十年来由于一些重要发现,光学重新活跃起来了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Increases cell turnover for visibly radiant and revitalized skin ., 增加细胞营业额显著辐射和重振旗鼓的皮肤.
a larger gear ratio at the first deceleration results in a slightly restrained second deceleration to produce a completely revitalized running style .较大的传动比在第一次减速，结果在一个稍微克制秒减速，以产生一个完全恢复活力的运行作风。
he called for a revitalized U.N. commitment to human rights and democratic rule , using his own rise to power as an example for the world .他还呼吁给联合国对人权和民主原则的承诺重新注入活力，并用他自己成为美国总统的事例向世界说明这一点。
as we remember God and Christ today may we be revitalized in our faith and commitment to dedicate our lives to Him in faithful and honest service .当我们今天纪念神和基督的时候，希望我们都在信心上再次充满活力，用我们的信心和诚实的侍奉把生命献给神。

list.abs: ...rie），体验的是中国市场中最受欢迎的一个项目——活化细胞再生疗程（revitalization program）。
一些化妆品的... ... T-Zone Balancing Gel T 字部位平衡凝胶 Eye Revitalizer 赋活眼(霜/凝胶/乳液) Essence Concentrate 精华液.
revisit 再访revitalizing waterflood 恢复注水驱油revival 复兴；复活
机械专业英语-中国设备网 ... buzzle 蜂鸣器 staker=reviting machine 铆合机 deputy manager | =vice manager 副理.

entry.tran: 使新生;使复兴;使恢复活力（或健康）
entry.def: To revitalize something that has lost its activity or its health means to make it active or healthy again.

example.ex: This hair conditioner is excellent for revitalizing dry, lifeless hair.
example.tran: 这种护发素能够非常有效地修复干枯的头发。

means.word_mean: 1. restored to new life and vigor;
